dict.string: We need your location to share it securely in your private chats.
We need access to your microphone to record and send secure voice messages in your private chats.
Camera access is needed to scan QR codes for joining chat rooms quickly and securely.
Inviso uses local network to discover and connect directly to nearby devices for peer-to-peer encrypted chats without relying on external servers.
We need to notify you when your chat partner is waiting so you don't miss conversations.
